headline: Uber Partners with the LA28 Olympic and Paralympic Games and Team USA as the Official Rideshare and On-Demand Delivery Partner to Help Games Stakeholders Go Anywhere and Get Anything
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, July 09, 2025--Uber (NYSE: UBER), the world’s leading mobility and delivery platform, is proud to announce it will be the official rideshare and on-demand delivery partner of the LA28 Olympic and Paralympic Games, as well as Team USA. This exciting partnership marks a significant step in facilitating smooth transportation and delivery services during two of the world’s most celebrated sporting events.

raw.headline: Uber Partners with the LA28 Olympic and Paralympic Games and Team USA as the Official Rideshare and On-Demand Delivery Partner to Help Games Stakeholders Go Anywhere and Get Anything
raw.summary: SAN FRANCISCO, July 09, 2025--Uber (NYSE: UBER), the world’s leading mobility and delivery platform, is proud to announce it will be the official rideshare and on-demand delivery partner of the LA28 Olympic and Paralympic Games, as well as Team USA. This exciting partnership marks a significant step in facilitating smooth transportation and delivery services during two of the world’s most celebrated sporting events.

headline: Olympics-Uber named official rideshare, delivery partner for Los Angeles Games
summary: Uber will serve as the official rideshare and on-demand delivery partner of the Los Angeles 2028 Olympic and Paralympic Games, as well as Team USA, organisers announced on Wednesday.  Uber Eats, the company's food delivery division, will provide on-demand meal delivery to athletes in the Olympic and Paralympic Village, with plans to introduce mobile ordering at select venues for spectators.

raw.headline: Olympics-Uber named official rideshare, delivery partner for Los Angeles Games
raw.summary: Uber will serve as the official rideshare and on-demand delivery partner of the Los Angeles 2028 Olympic and Paralympic Games, as well as Team USA, organisers announced on Wednesday.  Uber Eats, the company's food delivery division, will provide on-demand meal delivery to athletes in the Olympic and Paralympic Village, with plans to introduce mobile ordering at select venues for spectators.

headline: How Uber stock & drivers could get a boost from Trump's tax bill
summary: Truist co-chief investment officer and chief market strategist Keith Lerner, Crossmark Global Investments chief market strategist Victoria Fernandez, and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss Yahoo Finance's stock of the day: Uber (UBER). The "no tax on tips" provision of President Trump's tax bill includes 1099 contractors, potentially resulting in a 2.5% pay bump for US Uber drivers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid here.

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock to Own for Decades and 2 to Think Twice About
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is home to the biggest and most well-known companies in the market, making it a go-to index for investors seeking stability. But not all large-cap stocks are created equal - some are struggling with slowing growth, declining margins, or increased competition.

headline: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Uber vs. Tesla
summary: After redefining aspects of the transportation industry, Uber and Tesla have their eyes set on the autonomous vehicle market.  Uber opted to take on self-driving cars through partnerships with companies such as Waymo.  Tesla started its foray into driverless autos with a modified Model Y and plans a dedicated robotaxi in the future.
